boardgame.name: Valdora
boardgame.description: Hidden far away from our time lies a valley of unimaginable riches. Drawn by the lure of gold, silver, and precious jewels, adventurers from all over the world soon find their way there. While some of them still carefully choose commissions and provisions, others quickly rush off to bring valuable gems back to their patrons. But those who wish for fame and fortune will have to be cleverer than their opponents!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents: 1 game board, 78 gemstones, 4 books, 111 cards, 1 craftsman board, 59 tiles, 30 coins, 5 pawns, 1 bag, rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Gold Trilogy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Part two of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Gold Trilogy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (besides The Golden City and Felinia)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Awards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Empfehlungsliste _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Spiel des Jahres_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; 2009_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Familijna gra roku 2009 Magazynu Świat Gier Planszowych (Best Family Game 2009)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Deutscher Spielepreis, 6th place_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;Aring;rets spel 2009 Sweden, Nominee_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gameflash Nuremberg 2009_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pfefferkuchel 2009, 2nd place_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; XVth ludopathic 2009, Top Three_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rosenheimer Spielefr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;hling 2009, Top Five_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gra Numeru Magazynu Świat Gier Planszowych 10/09_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Best Family Strategy Game, GAMES Magazine, 2011_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Game by Game 2011, Recommendation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Game by Game 2010, Recommendation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Shrinkwrap removed but unplayed. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. The game: Abacus (c) 2009. English, German, French, Spanish and Italian rules included! Including: - Mini-Expansion: Neue Werkstätten - Expansion: Valdora Extra (without box) - Mini-Expansion: Sondertafel 19 - Mini-Expansion: Sondertafel 20 - Katalog-Edition 10: Special Contracts All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
Very Good. Buyer only pays actual shipping. Send me your postal code for an estimate. Combined shipping available. Thanks.

While some of them still carefully choose commissions and provisions, others quickly rush off to bring valuable gems back to their patrons. But those who wish for fame and fortune will have to be cleverer than their opponents!
